questionTitle: I go ________ school in the morning.
Would you like ________ to one of my friends about it?
Mr Brown ________ me a very nice letter a few days ago.
She ________ a very amusing article in one of the newspapers yesterday.
They are ________ their competition now.
He got ________ bronchitis and was taken to ________ hospital.
It was raining ________ so we couldn't go out.
________, please. I'll see if the manager is in.
Since your roommate is visiting her family this weekend, ________ you like to have dinner with us tonight?
The old man asked her to move because he ________ in that chair.
Excuse me, but it is time to have your temperature ________.
The ticket agent said that the plane would be boarding at ________.
At a potluck dinner, everyone who comes must ________ a dish.
Just put your coat in ________.
On the ________ to the town there is a beautiful wood .
But why did the police suspect you? It just doesn't make ________ to me.
If something is out of order, it is ________.
The tenants were ________ not to disturb other tenants after 1p.m.
This house ________ five rooms.
I don't know where he lives; I don't ________ know who he is.
